lyric:
[00:19.800]You're the light, you're the night
[00:22.140]You're the color of my blood
[00:24.800]You're the cure, you're the pain
[00:26.970]You're the only thing I wanna touch
[00:32.240]Never knew that it could mean so much
[00:37.150]So much
[00:40.130]You're the fear, I don't care
[00:42.320]Cause I've never been so high
[00:44.780]Follow me to the dark
[00:47.430]Let me take you past our satellites
[00:52.450]You can see the world you brought to life
[00:57.400]To life
[01:00.150]So love me like you do
[01:02.350]Love me like you do
[01:05.430]Love me like you do
[01:07.320]Love me like you do
[01:10.540]Touch me like you do
[01:12.450]Touch me like you do
[01:17.450]what are you waiting for?
[01:20.270]Fading in, fading out
[01:22.840]On the edge of paradise
[01:25.290]Every inch of your skin is a holy gray I've got to find
[01:32.980]Only you can set my heart on fire
[01:37.740]On fire
[01:40.010]Yeah, I'll let you set the pace
[01:45.350]Cause I'm not thinking straight
[01:50.580]My head spinning around I can't see clear no more
[01:57.990]what are you waiting for?
[02:01.140]Love me like you do
[02:02.970]Love me like you do
[02:06.110]Love me like you do
[02:07.990]Love me like you do
[02:11.130]Touch me like you do
[02:13.050]Touch me like you do
